content: तुल्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [तुलया संमितं यत्] {@--1@} Of the same kind or class, well-matched, similar, like, equal, resembling (with <ab>gen.</ab>, <ab>instr.</ab>, or in <ab>comp.</ab>); <ls>Ms. 4. 86</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 77</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 35</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 80</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 38.</ls> {@--2@} Fit for. {@--3@} Identical, same. {@--4@} Indifferent.
